title: Library in syslog uses line-command argument
body:
by **raul.san@sent.com**: 
I think that this little code is an error since it doesn't make sense that a library
depends of the line-command arguments.

http://golang.org/src/pkg/log/syslog/syslog.go#L59

	if prefix == "" {
		prefix = os.Args[0]
	}
